title: Packaging, M&Co: M&Co Labs Askew Wristwatch Package, 1983
title_raw: M&Co: M&Co Labs Askew Wristwatch Package
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & Co.
description:
When assembled, the package is comprised of the black flannel case (1993-151-430 - 3) containing the watch {not present here], inserted in the split of the foam wedge (1993-151-430 -2); this ensemble is wrapped by the insert (1993-151-430d), which is topped by the tab (1993-151-430 - 5). The whole is encased in the four-sided matte black cardboard wrapper (1993-151-430 - 1), which when closed forms a triangular shape, of which two sides are fastened in the center by a thin red string attached to metal grommets surrounded by black reinforcements. The wrapper's principal face is adorned in the center by a pale silver-colored label, outlined in black and imprinted M&Co (lower case italics)/ Labs (small sans serif capitals). 

1993-151-430 - 4 - The cardboard insert folds lengthwise in the center. On the recto, a photographic view in tones of gray shows a gondola car, passengers within, suspended on cables within a mountainous landscape. The company name and address are imprinted on four lines to the right of the car. Place/ stamp/ here is imprinted in the upper right hand corner. On the verso, except for a strip of the recto landscape located on the right edge, product information covers the surface.

1993-151-430 - 5 - The design on the white paper tab consists of an imprint, in miniature, of the face of the Askew wristwatch, reproduced in black at the lower end.

tombstone.epitaph:
Packaging, M&Co: M&Co Labs Askew Wristwatch Package, 1983. Offset lithography. 
Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & Co.. 1993-151-430-1/5
